name: A Day in Life
description:
“A Day in Life” is a short visual novel-like game, with some adventure and combat elements. Join Sacha and Jodie for a typical afternoon on their day off from work. The game presents canon material, but is non-essential to the happyhoney lore. 

Hope you enjoy! Approximately 7-10 minutes of gameplay.

  • If Jodie seems to run SLOW, then try holding down the SHIFT key to make him run. Autorun SHOULD be enabled but...this game do be funky sometimes.
  • Please download the executable if the web version does not run. I don't know why it does (or doesn't) do anything!!!1
